tasks.label: Compile and Run Java
args: & { javac '${file}'; if ($?) { if (Test-Path '${fileDirname}\input.txt') { Get-Content '${fileDirname}\input.txt' | java -cp '${fileDirname}' '${fileBasenameNoExtension}' | Out-File -Encoding ASCII '${fileDirname}\output.txt'; Write-Host 'Finished! Check output.txt' } else { java -cp '${fileDirname}' '${fileBasenameNoExtension}' } } }

tasks.label: Compile and Run C++
args: & { g++ -std=c++17 '${file}' -o '${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; if ($?) { if (Test-Path '${fileDirname}\input.txt') { Get-Content '${fileDirname}\input.txt' | & '${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' | Out-File -Encoding ASCII '${fileDirname}\output.txt'; Write-Host 'Finished! Check output.txt' } else { & '${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe' } } }
